name: Slug Boots
description:
In Slug Boots you play as an unknown villager from an unknown land (though it's definitely a cold land). For some unknown reason you possess boots with guns in the soles. When you live in a land of ice, having bullets shoot out your feet can cause... complications. Your mission is to help the young villager get back to the warmth of his igloo!

Controls:

  • A + D or the arrow keys to move.
  • Space to jump/shoot.
  • R to restart the current level.
  • Escape to return to the menu.

Credits:

  • JackOatley - art & level design
  • Iodine - music & sound
